ygData.msgSnippet: ... magical ... Many classes have missing/non-working spells since the start of the game (8 months).  The game is not finished, it is a work-in-progress.  But
ygData.messageBody:

> So in other words, we have payed for, and are playing, an unfinished class

magical
> class, that all spells/songs were ALREADY in the game)? I wonder how
> quickly this would have been fixed if druids or wizards had a few spells
> missing (or in their case, circles of spells).
> Just had to gripe.

Many classes have missing/non-working spells since the start of the game (8
months). The game is not finished, it is a work-in-progress. But it sure
is fun.


Wayne
